query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employees (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employer_id INT NOT NULL,
  first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(320),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  nationality VARCHAR(100),
  job_title VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255),
  employment_status ENUM('active', 'on_leave', 'terminated', 'suspended') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  hire_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  termination_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  is_saudi_national TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX employer_id_idx (employer_id),
  INDEX employment_status_idx (employment_status),
  INDEX nationality_idx (nationality),
  FOREIGN KEY (employer_id) REFERENCES employers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

  is_saudi_national TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX employer_id_idx (employer_id),
  INDEX employment_status_idx (employment_status),
  INDEX nationality_idx (nationality),
  FOREIGN KEY (employer_id) REFERENCES employers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
